comments: Excellent teacher, great explanations. He really helps you understand the subject.
Great professor, fun and interesting class! He gives a reasonable amount of homework and plenty of time for projects. His study guides tell you exactly what to memorize for his tests. Take him!
Exellent teacher, helps you apply this stuff the real world.

Robert Turley is probably my favorite professor I have had at COC. He is extremely smart and knows his stuff when it comes to sociology. He relates to the class and acts like he is in his 20\'s. He\'s an awesome teacher, I definately recommend you take his class.
Turley is awesome!! He\'s super funny and has good stories to tell. He gives out homework but it\'s not difficult. You will do fine on the tests if you studied. I got an A in the class. Take him!!

Only assignments are chapter reviews,NO tests.Discuss chapters daily & class participation is a grade %,which can be an issue because he does not keep a record,just decides at the end of the symester based on "memory". I kept a tally 4 insurance. He Is liberal,and if you have a conflicting point of view he will laugh,belittle,and gang up on you.
The tests are just like the Chapter Summaries. Interesting teacher. You don\'t have to take the final if you do all your homework and assignments well. I recommend.
just do all the assignments and show up to class. easy tests and hw

He\'s a lively extrovert man who\xe2\x80\x99s up2date w/ pop culture--No sense of an elitist scholar here. He\'s very conversant w/ sociology. Perhaps it\xe2\x80\x99s a function of the science he teaches, but he portrays himself 2 b quite down2earth & understanding & sensitive 2 our individual diffs. He shares his knowledge w/o going about it in a grandiloquent manner

Mr. Turley is really chill. If you pay attention you actually learn a lot..his class is pretty interesting and he uses his own real life stories to help the class understand..he also lets you out early sometimes which is pretty tight..i definately recommend him..if you just do your homework and pay attention during lecture you\'ll do well.
he is kinda crazy and wonders off on crazy topics. sometimes let class out early which was nice sometimes. overall it was an easy A but i rally didnt learn that much
